cast.name: 泰格·格南德特 Tygo Gernandt
西格丽德·那拍尔 Sigrid ten Napel
乔伊·范·里托芬 Joey van Rijthoven

writer.name: 迪埃德里克·范·罗伊詹 Diederik Van Rooijen

introduction: Former drugs queen Carmen is in hiding in Canada and is leading an anonymous life out there. By pretending she’s dead, she hopes her children can lead a normal life back in Amsterdam.  She keeps her nose clean until one evening, a colleague is attacked, and Carmen has no choice but to come to her rescue. Out of self-defense, she kills the perpetrator, is arrested and extradited to the Netherlands.While her children are in shock that their mother is still alive, there are also quite some people who still have unfinished business with Carmen. Everyone is dragged into a roller coaster in which problems multiply at an incredible pace. Carmen will now need to put an end to her past once and for all to rescue her family.
